{% comment %} Wrapper for the toc.html Liquid tag for generating a table of contents from a Markdown source. This tag defines parameters that can be given variables as values which are then interpreted and given to toc.html. Each optional parameter has a default value and can be omitted. Usage: {% include toc_wrapper.html html=content sanitize=true class="inline_toc" id="my_toc" h_min=2 h_max=3 %} Required Parameters: * html (string) - the HTML of compiled markdown generated by kramdown in Jekyll Optional Parameters: * sanitize (bool) : false - when set to true, the headers will be stripped of any HTML in the TOC * class (string) : '' - a CSS class assigned to the TOC * id (string) : '' - an ID to assigned to the TOC * h_min (int) : 1 - the minimum TOC header level to use; any header lower than this value will be ignored * h_max (int) : 6 - the maximum TOC header level to use; any header greater than this value will be ignored * ordered (bool) : false - when set to true, an ordered list will be outputted instead of an unordered list * item_class (string) : '' - add custom class(es) for each list item; has support for '%level%' placeholder, which is the current heading level * baseurl (string) : '' - add a base url to the TOC links for when your TOC is on another page than the actual content * anchor_class (string) : '' - add custom class(es) for each anchor element Output: An ordered or unordered list representing the table of contents of a markdown block. This snippet will only generate the table of contents and will NOT output the markdown given to it. {% endcomment %} {% comment %} Required Parameters {% endcomment %} {% assign htmlContent = include.html %} {% comment %} Optional Parameters {% endcomment %} {% assign sanitizeHTML = include.sanitize | default: false %} {% assign cssClass = include.class | default: '' %} {% assign tocID = include.id | default: '' %} {% assign minHeader = include.h_min | default: 1 %} {% assign maxHeader = include.h_max | default: 6 %} {% assign orderedList = include.ordered | default: false %} {% assign itemClass = include.item_class | default: '' %} {% assign baseurl = include.baseurl | default: '' %} {% assign anchorClass = include.anchor_class | default: '' %} {% include toc.html html=htmlContent sanitize=sanitizeHTML class=cssClass id=tocID h_min=minHeader h_max=maxHeader ordered=orderedList item_class=itemClass baseurl=baseurl anchor_class=anchorClass %}
